alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:41PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Mitchell and eastern Jewell Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Webber to near Randall to near Barnard. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds perhaps in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beloit, Mankato, Jewell, Asherville, Formoso, Simpson, Randall, Webber, Scottsville, Lovewell State Park and Montrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
